name: Oui chef!
objective:
Put %%icon icon-egg$%% eggs that have the same parity as the top egg in the %%icon icon-cauldron$%% cauldrons.

For example, if the top egg is even, put all the even eggs into the cauldrons.

%%icon mdi mdi-information-outline$%% If %%type-operator$n%% is an even number, then %%type-operator$n % 2 = 0%%.
loss_reason_wrong_egg_in_cauldron_even: A hero put an odd %%icon icon-egg$%% egg in a %%icon icon-cauldron$%% cauldron while the top egg is even.
loss_reason_wrong_egg_in_cauldron_odd: A hero put an even %%icon icon-egg$%% egg in a %%icon icon-cauldron$%% cauldron while the top egg is odd.
